Ilija Nestorovski (Palermo) produces an attempt from the edge of the box which would have most likely endangered the goalkeeper, but one of the defending players blocked it, so we can only speculate about the outcome.

annotations.label: time
annotations.description: There will be a minimum of 3 min. of added time.
Francesco Totti (AS Roma) horribly skewed a first time shot from the edge of the box and sent the ball way wide of the right post.

annotations.description: The ball is whipped in from the corner by Bruno Henrique (Palermo), but one of the defenders gets it clear.

Bruno Henrique (Palermo) gets on the end of a pass and takes a shot from the edge of the box, but it's blocked by one of the defending players. The linesman points to the corner flag, Palermo are going to take it.

annotations.label: y-card
annotations.description: Mohamed Salah (AS Roma) gives the referee no choice but to show him a yellow card.

annotations.label: soccer-ball
annotations.description: Stephan El Shaarawy (AS Roma) receives a brilliant pass inside the box from Mohamed Salah, and he beats the goalkeeper with a low accurate shot into the middle of the goal. He makes it 4:1.

annotations.label: substitution
annotations.description: Luciano Spalletti has decided to make a change. Francesco Totti (AS Roma) replaces Edin Dzeko.

annotations.label: soccer-ball
annotations.description: Goal! Edoardo Goldaniga passes the ball to Robin Quaison (Palermo) and he fires in a shot from the edge of the box which is deflected. Wojciech Szczesny couldn't do anything about it. 3:1.
AS Roma move the ball around well as they wait for an opportunity to shoot, but the attack is halted as they lose possession.

annotations.description: Here comes a substitution. Alessandro Diamanti is given a rest as he is replaced by Mato Jajalo (Palermo).

annotations.label: soccer-ball
annotations.description: Alessandro Florenzi passes to Edin Dzeko (AS Roma), who collects the ball and unleashes a terrific shot from the edge of the box. His effort goes into the bottom right corner. Fabulous goal! The score is 3:0.
A cross by Haitam Aleesami (Palermo) from the side of the pitch flies into the box, but fails to find its intended target as the aim was poor.

annotations.label: funfact
annotations.description: We can have a look at the statistics now, particularly the total attempts – 18:8.
Edin Dzeko (AS Roma) latches on to a sweet cross inside the box and misses with a header high above the bar.

Josip Posavec doesn't have to worry about this one. Mohamed Salah plays a pass into the feet of Alessandro Florenzi (AS Roma), who is unable to find the target as his effort from inside the box goes high over the bar.

annotations.label: substitution
annotations.description: Roberto De Zerbi has decided to substitute Michel Morganella and he is replaced by Andrea Rispoli (Palermo).

Sinisa Andelkovic (Palermo) attempts to convert a lofted cross as he jumps high and heads the ball to the bottom right corner. Wojciech Szczesny shows his brilliant reflexes and pulls off a glorious save to stop the ball from hitting the net.

annotations.label: corner
annotations.description: Alessandro Diamanti (Palermo) works the corner short instead of sending the ball into the penalty area.
Wojciech Szczesny blocks a long range effort from Alessandro Diamanti (Palermo) towards the bottom left corner. The referee signals a corner kick to Palermo.

annotations.label: corner
annotations.description: Bruno Henrique (Palermo) whips in the corner, but one of the defending players gets a head on it and intercepts.
Ivaylo Chochev (Palermo) looks to break free, but an opposing player clears the ball away. The referee points to the corner flag. It's a corner to Palermo.

annotations.label: soccer-ball
annotations.description: Leandro Paredes (AS Roma) takes the free kick from mid range and finds the back of the net with the goalkeeper rooted to the spot.

Alessandro Diamanti (Palermo) should know this behaviour is beyond the rules. He was too careless with his challenge and left Gianpaolo Calvarese no option but to blow his whistle. A free kick has been awarded to AS Roma.
Palermo are enjoying a spell of pressure at the moment, but one of the defenders gets it clear.
Stephan El Shaarawy (AS Roma) sends a teasing cross into the area, but Josip Posavec intercepts the ball.
Edin Dzeko (AS Roma) is caught offside!

annotations.label: substitution

annotations.label: whistle
annotations.description: The second half has just started.

Well, a decent first half here. It's certainly not boring, but not the best match either. The hosts dominated much of the first period. Pass and move. The home side have played some possession football so far, while the visitors have been patient as they wait for the right moment to hit them on the break.

annotations.label: whistle
annotations.description: The end of the first half.

annotations.label: corner
annotations.description: The resulting corner from Leandro Paredes (AS Roma) is cleared by the opposition's defence.
Radja Nainggolan (AS Roma) wastes a good opportunity as his pass into the box is blocked by the defence. The ball goes out of play. AS Roma are awarded a corner kick.
Leandro Paredes (AS Roma) finds himself in a promising position after receiving a precise pass. He pulls the trigger but only hits one of the opposition, who gets in the way of his effort.
Thiago Rangel Cionek (Palermo) holds his opponent to prevent him from getting the ball and the referee blows for a foul after seeing the whole situation.

annotations.label: y-card
annotations.description: Gianpaolo Calvarese shows a yellow card to Ivaylo Chochev (Palermo) for his blatant foul.
Close! Alessandro Diamanti (Palermo) stands over the resulting free kick from around 19 metres out and his shot goes just over the crossbar.

annotations.label: y-card
annotations.description: This yellow card was deserved. The tackle by Juan Jesus (AS Roma) was quite harsh and Gianpaolo Calvarese didn't hesitate to show him a yellow card. Palermo are awarded a free kick.
Leandro Paredes (AS Roma) crosses the ball from the free kick, but it goes out of play.

annotations.label: soccer-ball

annotations.label: corner
annotations.description: The referee awards a corner and Daniele De Rossi (AS Roma) goes over to take it.
Stephan El Shaarawy (AS Roma) tries to send a pass but it's blocked. Good work from AS Roma as they win a corner.
Edin Dzeko (AS Roma) gets to a rebound inside the goalmouth, but even from this distance he misses the target and fails to score.

Stephan El Shaarawy (AS Roma) meets a pass on the edge of the penalty area and shoots towards the bottom right corner. He didn't put enough power into the effort, though, and Josip Posavec pulls off an easy save.
Ivaylo Chochev (Palermo) tries to find Ilija Nestorovski, but he puts too much power on the pass.
Konstantinos Manolas (AS Roma) sees the run of Mohamed Salah and tries to slip the ball to him, but Josip Posavec sees the danger and gathers.
The defence had a hard time blocking out the strike from Thiago Rangel Cionek (Palermo). He didn't hesitate and finished from outside the box right after he had received a pass from his teammate.
Stephan El Shaarawy (AS Roma) threw away a promising scoring opportunity. He received a fine cross inside the 6 yard box, but his shot missed the target close to the right post.
AS Roma control the tempo of the game by exchanging some accurate short passes.
Mohamed Salah (AS Roma) goes on a solo run, but he fails to create a chance as an opposition player blocks him.
